# Configuration for module: ArchiveDiff

elseif (LINUX64)

elseif (WIN32)

    src/ArchiveDiff_main.cpp

  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( LINUX32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "ArchiveDiff" )
elseif( LINUX64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "ArchiveDiff" )
elseif( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "ArchiveDiff" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "ArchiveDiff" )
endif()
if( LINUX32 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( LINUX64 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN32 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( LINUX32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ARCHIVEDIFF_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ARCHIVEDIFF_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( LINUX64 )

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ARCHIVEDIFF_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} ArchiveDiffLib gucefCORE gucefMT gucefPATCHER )
  set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ARCHIVEDIFF_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN64 )
